name: encounter (itch)
description:
#Encounter #PLAY_ONLINE_MULTIPLAYER WITH YOUR's FRIENDS) is a Best game loaded with lot of Action and Excitement.
Here in this game you are going to take the role of an Agent who is going through the process of Encounter. In Encounter his Skill, Mental and Physical abilities are tested. You must be the finest to get selected.

Smooth gameplay
Lot of weapons including special weapons like short Gun , Sniper , pistole , new knife E.T.C
Use your favorite attachments on your weapons to suit your play style
Uniqueness in each level with different Exp
Action filled gameplay
Adjust graphics settings to make this game run smooth even on low end devices
This is one Action ONLINE MULTIPLAYER game that you all want to try

More interesting updates coming soon...

This game is still in Team Encounter, please let us know if you find any issues inside the game, we will try to resolve them as soon as possible
